short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily add your candidates in Kariyer.net and Linkedin to FlowQ.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can easily add your candidates in Kariyer.net to FlowQ*. You don't need to transfer profile fields and values to FlowQ manually. 

Follow the steps: 
- Open the candidate detail page in Kariyet.net, 
- Login to your FlowQ account on the extension,
- Select your job in the dropdown on the extension,
- Click "Add to..." button on the candidate page

This extension can run only on "https://ats.kariyer.net/#/ozgemis-detay", "https://www.linkedin.com/recruiter/", "https://www.linkedin.com/hiring/", "https://www.linkedin.com/talent/" pages. 

*This extension made for enterprise customers of FlowQ. You need an account that has a company admin role. Please visit flowq.com for more details or contact support@flowq.com.
